pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fertility Models // Four fertility models are fitted using non- linear least squares. These are the Hadwiger, the Gamma, the Model1 and Model2, following the terminology of the following paper: Peristera P. and Kostaki A. (2007). "Modeling fertility in modern populations". Demographic Research, 16(6): 141--194. doi:10.4054/DemRes.2007.16.6.
